help:
I try to be helpful, but can be sassy. Here's what I can help you with:
```!banlist``` ```!ban, !whyban <card name>``` ```!endofturn``` ```!source``` ```!rule, !rules, !ruling <rule section>``` ```!combo <card name>```
To be curtious to other conversations, talk to me in #bot_commands :)
compliment: You make my heart buzz like a Mount Pillar Hive Call
You have the courage of a hundred Mandiblors
Your face is more perfect than a Song of Symmetry
You're more down to earth than Nom
You don't have to be a M'arrillian to make me love your mind
They use Mugic to call Aa'une, they use your voice to call me
Your body flows like a Fluidmorpher
Are you Son'las? Because you see the whole picture
I hope you're not from Dranikus Threshold, cause I'd hate for our time to be past
You make me feel bigger than a Warbeast with Fortissimo
You're as fiery as Magmon on taco night
You're sharper than Bladez's sword
You shine brighter than the Aichlyys sky
Are you wearing the Algal Wings? Cause I'm attracted to you
You're as refreshing as an Aqua Shield
If I had a Flux Bauble, I'd flux straight to you
I wish I had a Spectral Viewer so I could see you more
I wish I could put you in a mixed army but you're too loyal
I wish I could have 2 copies of you, but you're too unique
I wish I could give you a Dread Tread, but you're too legendary
I don't need any adjacent creatures, you give me enough support
You're like a Warbeast: powerful, majestic and worth the risk
Are we in Storm Tunnel? Cause you got me walking on air
You must use air and courage, cause you got a real Fearocity
You save the day more than Wytod
You must be Ørth, cause you rock
You must be Cromaxx, cause nothing lowers your energy
You got better flow than the Riverlands
You must be Ixxik, cause no one can tame you
Did Hearken make you? Cause I wanna just eat you up
Are you Vidav? Cause you always got a great plan
You're a better value than Primal Smash
You must have defender, cause nothing gets past you
You must have untargetable, cause you can't be touched
You're more humble than Olkiex
I wish I had a Mugic Reprise, so I could listen to you again
Are you a Warbeast? Cause you got some discipline
You're more balanced than a Song of Symmetry
You're more refreshing than a Song of Resurgence
You must be Heptadd, cause you got it all
You must be wearing Stone Mail, cause nothing phases you
You smell as good as a fresh pack of cards
You're more efficient than Lore is with Mugic

Me: H'earring
You: Dractyl scales
You're as versatile as Iparu
Are you Kiru Village? Cause you're gonna be great one day
Are you Ubliqun? Cause you got the moves
You're more creative than Mommark
You're funnier than Yokkis
You're more special to me than Chaotic
